attributes.action: Stop Car hp companys chasing reg keepers for outstanding debt.Chase the debtor.
attributes.background: If you buy a car with outstanding finance that you know nothing about you become liable for that debt not the person who sold a car that they legaly do not own. Chase the debtor for outstanding monies not the innocent party who may now lose their new car.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for new legal requirements when buying a used car, such as HPI checks.
